prompts: Create a mythical Pokemon with elegant antlers and a sleek green body.
Show me a grass-type creature resembling a deer, with vibrant colors and a strong stance.
Imagine a powerful Pokemon adorned with leaf patterns and a serene expression.
Generate a nature guardian that features a blend of green and white, standing tall in the forest.
Design a majestic creature with a swift build, perfect for battling in grassy terrains.
Give me a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of nature with graceful movements.
Make a Pokemon that has a calming aura, with striking red accents and a unique body shape.
